title: Anilist Scrobbler
slogan: This extension isn't on the Chrome Web Store, here is the procedure
not_affiliated: We are not affiliated to Anilist, this is a project without link with the platform.
licence: Our extension is free to use within the conditions of the CC BY-SA 4.0 FR licence terms
second_step: The extension will be downloaded and click "Continue" if this window is displayed.
fourth_step: And drag the downloaded extension on the page :
end: That's it ! Login to Anilist.co and you are ready !
respective_owners: The pictures belong to their respective owners.
